body_html: It looks like that would effectively make every PyTorch version citable separately, and I'm not sure if that's what we want. The project is under very active development, so it doesn't make sense to me to fragment those references.

body: It looks like that would effectively make every PyTorch version citable separately, and I'm not sure if that's what we want. The project is under very active development, so it doesn't make sense to me to fragment those references.
